SWB
SWB - A Modified Thornthwaite-Mather soil-water-balance Code for Estimating Groundwater Recharge

model.F90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 module model
00002 !!****h* SWB/model
00003 ! NAME
00004 !
00005 !   model.f95 - Main program module - Handles initialization and execution
00006 !               of process modules.
00007 !
00008 ! SYNOPSIS
00009 !   Module model coordinates execution of all process modules that make up
00010 !   the SWB model. Initializes model configuration parameters, allocates memory to store
00011 !   intermediate calculation results, and handles execution of
00012 !   process modules.
00013 !
00014 ! NOTES
00015 !   The first section of this code reads the model control file and
00016 !   sets model configuration parameters. Program control shifts to the
00017 !   model_Solve subroutine once the code encounters a SOLVE statement
00018 !   in the control file.
00019 !
00020 !!***
00021 
00022   use types
00023   use swb_grid
00024   use swb_stats
00025   use runoff_curve_number
00026   use et_thornthwaite_mather
00027   use et_turc
00028   use et_hargreaves
00029   use et_jensen_haise
00030   use et_blaney_criddle
00031   use sm_thornthwaite_mather
00032   use snow
00033   use irrigation
00034 
00035 #ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00036   use netcdf_support
00037 #endif
00038 
00039   implicit none
00040 
00041   !! Counter for moving average water inputs
00042   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iDayCtr
00043 
00044   !! For the "downhill" solution
00045   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iOrderCount
00046   integer (kind=T_INT), dimension(:), allocatable :: iOrderCol
00047   integer (kind=T_INT), dimension(:), allocatable :: iOrderRow
00048   real(kind=T_SGL) :: rStartTime,rEndTime
00049 
00050 contains
00051 
00052 
00053 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 !!****s* model/model_Solve
00055 ! NAME
00056 !   model_Solve - Reads and initializes model grids and executes process
00057 !                 subroutines.
00058 !
00059 ! SYNOPSIS
00060 !   Reads and initializes model grids, reads climate data file, and handles
00061 !   calls each process subroutine on a daily basis.
00062 !
00063 ! INPUTS
00064 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
00065 !   pConfig - Pointer to the model configuration data structure.
00066 !
00067 ! OUTPUTS
00068 !   NONE
00069 !
00070 !!***
00071 
00072 subroutine model_Solve( pGrd, pConfig, pGraph )
00073 
00074   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
00075   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd, pTempGrid    ! pointer to model grid
00076   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig      ! pointer to data structure that contains
00077                                                         ! model options, flags, and other settings
00078 
00079   type (T_GRAPH_CONFIGURATION), dimension(:), pointer :: pGraph
00080        ! pointer to data structure that holds parameters for creating
00081        ! DISLIN plots
00082 
00083 #ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00084   type (T_NETCDF_FILE), pointer :: pNC
00085 #endif
00086 
00087   ! [ LOCALS ]
00088   integer (kind=T_INT) :: i, j, k, iStat, iDayOfYear, iMonth
00089 !  integer (kind=T_INT) :: iDay, iYear, tj, ti
00090   integer (kind=T_INT) :: tj, ti
00091   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iTempDay, iTempMonth, iTempYear
00092   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iPos
00093   integer (kind=T_INT) :: jj, ii, iNChange, iUpstreamCount, iPasses
00094   character(len=3) :: sMonthName
00095   logical (kind=T_LOGICAL) :: lMonthEnd
00096 !  real (kind=T_SGL) :: rAvgT,rMinT,rMaxT,rPrecip,rRH,rMinRH,rWindSpd,rSunPct
00097   integer (kind=T_INT),save :: iNumGridCells
00098 !  integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumDaysInYear
00099 !  integer (kind=T_INT) :: iEndOfYearJulianDay
00100 
00101   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rmin,ravg,rmax
00102 
00103   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel
00104   character (len=256) :: sBuf
00105 
00106   type (T_TIME_SERIES_FILE), pointer :: pTS
00107 
00108   ! allocate memory for the time-series data pointer
00109   ALLOCATE (pTS, STAT=iStat)
00110   call Assert( iStat == 0, &
00111      "Could not allocate memory for time-series data structure", &
00112      TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
00113 
00114 !  call stats_OpenBinaryFiles(pConfig)
00115 
00116   FIRST_YEAR: if(pConfig%lFirstYearOfSimulation) then
00117 
00118     call stats_OpenBinaryFiles(pConfig, pGrd)
00119 
00120     call stats_InitializeVolumeConversion(pGrd)
00121 
00122 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
00123       call grid_WriteArcGrid("SSF_Grid_Cells."//trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix), &
00124           pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rX1,pGrd%rY0,pGrd%rY1,REAL(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%iNumFilesSSF) )
00125 #endif
00126 
00127     ! open file into which daily summaries of variables will be written
00128     if ( pConfig%lReportDaily ) then
00129       open(unit=LU_MSB_REPORT, file='recharge_daily_report.csv',iostat=iStat,&
00130          status='REPLACE')
00131       call Assert(iStat == 0, &
00132          "Problem opening mass balance report file for output.")
00133 
00134       write(LU_MSB_REPORT,FMT="(300A)") 'Month,Day,Year,Date,Day of Year,' &
00135       // 'Mean Avg Temp,' &
00136       // 'Mean Min Temp,' &
00137       // 'Mean Max Temp,' &
00138       // 'CFGI,' &
00139       // 'Min Adj CN,' &
00140       // 'Mean Adj CN,' &
00141       // 'Max Adj CN,' &
00142       // 'Gross Precip, Interception,' &
00143       // 'Net Precip,' &
00144       // 'Snowfall,' &
00145       // 'Net Rainfall,' &
00146       // 'TOTAL Surface Storage (snow),' &
00147       // 'Change in Surface Storage (snow),' &
00148       // 'Snowmelt,' &
00149       // 'TOTAL Soil Moisture Storage,' &
00150       // 'Change in Soil Moisture Storage, Surface Flow Out of Grid,' &
00151       // 'Rejected Recharge,' &
00152       // 'Actual Evapotranspiration,' &
00153       // 'Recharge,' &
00154 #ifdef STREAM_INTERACTIONS
00155       // 'Stream Capture,' &
00156 #endif
00157 #ifdef IRRIGATION_MODULE
00158       // 'Irrigation applied,' &
00159 #endif
00160       // 'MASS BALANCE'
00161 
00162     end if
00163 
00164     ! open CSV file for daily stats summary
00165     if ( pConfig%lReportDaily ) then
00166       open(unit=LU_CSV, file='recharge_daily_statistics.csv',iostat=iStat,&
00167          status='REPLACE')
00168       call Assert(iStat == 0, &
00169          "Problem opening CSV file for summary statistics output.")
00170       call stats_WriteDailyAccumulatorHeaderCSV(LU_CSV)
00171     end if
00172 
00173     ! open CSV file for annual stats summary
00174     open(unit=LU_CSV_ANNUAL, file='recharge_annual_statistics.csv',iostat=iStat,&
00175        status='REPLACE')
00176     call Assert(iStat == 0, &
00177        "Problem opening CSV file for summary annual statistics output.")
00178     call stats_WriteAnnualAccumulatorHeaderCSV(LU_CSV_ANNUAL)
00179 
00180     iNumGridCells = pGrd%iNX * pGrd%iNY
00181 
00182     ! Time the run
00183     call cpu_time(rStartTime)
00184 
00185      !!! TESTING BLOCK - NetCDF output
00186 !    pTempGrid=>grid_Create( pGrd%iNX, pGrd%iNY, pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rY0, &
00187 !             pGrd%rX1, pGrd%rY1, T_SGL_GRID )
00188 !   pTempGrid%rData = pGrd%Cells%rSoilMoisture
00189 !    pNC => pConfig%NETCDF_FILE(iSOIL_MOISTURE,iNC_OUTPUT)
00190 !    pNC%sVarName = "soil_moist"
00191 !    pNC%iNCID = netcdf_create("Initial_Soil_Moisture.nc")
00192 !    call netcdf_write_attributes(iSOIL_MOISTURE, iNC_OUTPUT, pConfig, pGrd)
00193 !    call netcdf_write_variable(iSOIL_MOISTURE, iNC_OUTPUT, pConfig, &
00194 !        pTempGrid, 1)
00195 !    call grid_destroy(pTempGrid)
00196 !    call netcdf_check(nf90_close(pNC%iNCID),TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
00197     !!! END OF TESTING BLOCK - NetCDF output
00198 
00199     ! Are we solving using the downhill algorithm?
00200     if ( pConfig%iConfigureRunoffMode == CONFIG_RUNOFF_DOWNHILL ) then
00201       ! if a routing table exists, read it in; else initialize and
00202       ! save the routing table for future use
00203       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "model.f95: model_ConfigureRunoffDownhill"
00204       call model_ConfigureRunoffDownhill( pGrd, pConfig)
00205     end if
00206 
00207     ! Unless we are *not* routing water, we *must* call InitializeFlowDirection
00208     if( pConfig%iConfigureRunoffMode /= CONFIG_RUNOFF_NO_ROUTING) then
00209       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "model.f95: model_InitializeFlowDirection"
00210       call model_InitializeFlowDirection( pGrd , pConfig)
00211     end if
00212 
00213     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "model.f95: model_InitializeET"
00214     flush(unit=LU_LOG)
00215     call model_InitializeET( pGrd, pConfig )
00216 
00217   end if FIRST_YEAR
00218 
00219   ! close any existing open time-series files...
00220   close(LU_TS)
00221 
00222   if(.not. pConfig%lGriddedData) then
00223   ! Connect to the single-site time-series file
00224     open ( unit=LU_TS, file=pConfig%sTimeSeriesFilename, &
00225       status="OLD", iostat=iStat )
00226     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "Opening time series file: ", &
00227       TRIM(pConfig%sTimeSeriesFilename)
00228     call Assert ( iStat == 0, &
00229       "Can't open time-series data file" )
00230     pConfig%iCurrentJulianDay = pConfig%iCurrentJulianDay + 1
00231     call gregorian_date(pConfig%iCurrentJulianDay, &
00232             iTempYear, iTempMonth, iTempDay)
00233     pConfig%iYear = iTempYear
00234     pConfig%iMonth = iTempMonth
00235     pConfig%iDay = iTempDay
00236   end if
00237 
00238   ! Zero out monthly and annual accumulators
00239   call stats_InitializeMonthlyAccumulators()
00240   call stats_InitializeAnnualAccumulators()
00241 
00242 
00243   ! ***************************
00244   ! ***** BEGIN MAIN LOOP *****
00245   ! ***************************
00246 
00247   MAIN_LOOP: do
00248 
00249     ! new day: initialize stats accumulators
00250     call stats_InitializeDailyAccumulators()
00251 
00252     ! blow away any remnant climate values
00253     pTS%rPrecip = iNO_DATA_NCDC
00254     pTS%rRH = iNO_DATA_NCDC
00255     pTS%rMaxT = iNO_DATA_NCDC
00256     pTS%rMinT = iNO_DATA_NCDC
00257     pTS%rWindSpd = iNO_DATA_NCDC
00258     pTS%rMinRH = iNO_DATA_NCDC
00259     pTS%rSunPct = iNO_DATA_NCDC
00260     pTS%lEOF = lFALSE
00261 
00262     if(.not. pConfig%lGriddedData) then
00263       call model_ReadTimeSeriesFile(pTS)
00264       if(pTS%lEOF) then
00265 #ifdef STRICT_DATE_CHECKING
00266         if(.not. (pConfig%iMonth == 12 .and. pConfig%iDay == 31)) then
00267           write(unit=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "Time series file ends prematurely:"
00268           write(unit=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "  file = "//TRIM(pConfig%sTimeSeriesFilename)
00269           write(unit=sBuf,FMT=*) "Time series file ends prematurely: "//TRIM(pConfig%sTimeSeriesFilename)
00270           call Assert(lFALSE,TRIM(sBuf),TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
00271         end if
00272 #endif
00273         close(unit=LU_TS)
00274         exit MAIN_LOOP
00275       end if
00276 
00277       ! check to ensure that we have not skipped a day
00278       if(.not. (pConfig%iYear == pTS%iYear &
00279         .and. pConfig%iMonth == pTS%iMonth &
00280         .and. pConfig%iDay == pTS%iDay)) then
00281         write(unit=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "Missing or out-of-order data in time-series file:"
00282         write(unit=LU_STD_OUT,FMT=*) "Missing or out-of-order data in time-series file"
00283         write(unit=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "  date (TS file)= "//TRIM(int2char(pTS%iMonth))//"/" &
00284           //TRIM(int2char(pTS%iDay))//"/" &
00285           //TRIM(int2char(pTS%iYear))
00286         write(unit=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "  date (SWB)= "//TRIM(int2char(pConfig%iMonth))//"/" &
00287           //TRIM(int2char(pConfig%iDay))//"/" &
00288           //TRIM(int2char(pConfig%iYear))
00289 #ifdef STRICT_DATE_CHECKING
00290         call Assert(lFALSE,"",TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
00291 #else
00292         ! reset date to that of the input time-series data
00293         pConfig%iYear = pTS%iYear
00294         pConfig%iMonth = pTS%iMonth
00295         pConfig%iDay = pTS%iDay
00296         pConfig%iCurrentJulianDay = julian_day ( pConfig%iYear, pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iDay )
00297 #endif
00298       end if
00299 
00300       pConfig%iNumDaysInYear = num_days_in_year(pConfig%iYear)
00301     end if
00302 
00303     call LookupMonth(pConfig%iMonth,pConfig%iDay,pConfig%iYear, &
00304        pConfig%iDayOfYear,sMonthName,lMonthEnd)
00305 
00306     ! initialize landuse-associated variables; must be done each year if
00307     ! dynamic landuse is being used
00308     FIRST_YEAR_OR_DYN_LU: if(pConfig%lFirstDayOfSimulation &
00309       .or. (pConfig%iMonth == 1 .and. pConfig%iDay == 1 &
00310        .and. (pConfig%iConfigureLanduse == CONFIG_LANDUSE_DYNAMIC_ARC_GRID &
00311        .or. pConfig%iConfigureLanduse == CONFIG_LANDUSE_DYNAMIC_SURFER) )) then
00312 
00313       if( pConfig%iConfigureLanduse == CONFIG_LANDUSE_DYNAMIC_ARC_GRID &
00314        .or. pConfig%iConfigureLanduse == CONFIG_LANDUSE_DYNAMIC_SURFER) then
00315 
00316         call model_GetDynamicLanduseValue( pGrd, pConfig, pConfig%iYear)
00317 
00318       endif
00319 
00320       ! Initialize the model
00321       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "model.f95: calling model_InitializeSM"
00322       flush(unit=LU_LOG)
00323       call model_InitializeSM(pGrd, pConfig)
00324 
00325       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "model.f95: runoff_InitializeCurveNumber"
00326       flush(unit=LU_LOG)
00327       call runoff_InitializeCurveNumber( pGrd ,pConfig)
00328 
00329       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "model.f95: model_InitialMaxInfil"
00330       flush(unit=LU_LOG)
00331       call model_InitializeMaxInfil(pGrd, pConfig )
00332 
00333     end if FIRST_YEAR_OR_DYN_LU
00334 
00335 
00336     if(pConfig%lFirstDayOfSimulation) then
00337       do k=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00338         if(STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput > iNONE &
00339           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput > iNONE &
00340           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput > iNONE)  then
00341           inquire(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,POS=iPos)  ! establish location to return to
00342           write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,POS=iSTARTDATE_POS) &
00343              pConfig%iMonth,pConfig%iDay, pConfig%iYear
00344           write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,POS=iPos ) ! return to prior location in bin file
00345         end if
00346         pConfig%lFirstDayOfSimulation = lFALSE
00347       end do
00348 
00349 #ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00350       call model_write_NetCDF_attributes(pConfig, pGrd)
00351 #endif
00352     end if
00353 
00354     if(pConfig%lWriteToScreen) then
00355       write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT=*)
00356       if(pConfig%lANSI_Colors) then
00357         write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(1x,a7,a80,a7)") sBOLDWHITE,REPEAT('=',80),sWHITE
00358       else
00359         write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(1x,a80)") REPEAT('=',80)
00360       end if
00361       write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(1x,'DAY: ',i3,4x,A3,4x,i2,'/',i2,'/',i4)") &
00362          pConfig%iDayOfYear,sMonthName,pConfig%iMonth,pConfig%iDay,pConfig%iYear
00363 !      write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(1x,a80)") REPEAT('-',80)
00364       write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT=*)
00365     end if
00366 
00367     ! write timestamp to the unformatted fortran file(s)
00368     do k=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00369         if(STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput > iNONE &
00370           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput > iNONE &
00371           .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput > iNONE)  then
00372         write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU) pConfig%iDay,pConfig%iMonth, &
00373              pConfig%iYear, pConfig%iDayOfYear
00374       end if
00375     end do
00376 
00377     ! Initialize precipitation value for current day
00378     call model_GetDailyPrecipValue(pGrd, pConfig, pTS%rPrecip, &
00379        pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iDay, pConfig%iYear)
00380 
00381     ! Initialize temperature values for current day
00382     call model_GetDailyTemperatureValue(pGrd, pConfig, &
00383        pTS%rAvgT, pTS%rMinT, pTS%rMaxT, pTS%rRH, &
00384        pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iDay, pConfig%iYear)
00385 
00386     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(1x,'Beginning calculations for day: '," &
00387          //"i3,4x,A3,4x,i2,'/',i2,'/',i4)") &
00388          pConfig%iDayOfYear,sMonthName,pConfig%iMonth,pConfig%iDay,pConfig%iYear
00389 
00390 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
00391       call stats_WriteMinMeanMax (LU_LOG, "Precip: ", pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip)
00392 #endif
00393 
00394     if(pConfig%lWriteToScreen) then
00395       write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(t39,a,t53,a,t69,a)") "min","mean","max"
00396       call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_STD_OUT,"Minimum Temp (F)" , pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMin )
00397       call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_STD_OUT,"Mean Temp (F)" , pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTAvg )
00398       call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_STD_OUT,"Maximum Temp (F)" , pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMax )
00399 !      write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(1x,a80)") REPEAT('-',80)
00400       write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT=*)
00401     end if
00402 
00403     call model_UpdateContinuousFrozenGroundIndex( pGrd , pConfig)
00404 
00405 #ifdef IRRIGATION_MODULE
00406     call model_UpdateGrowingDegreeDay( pGrd , pConfig)
00407 #endif
00408 
00409     ! Handle all the processes in turn
00410 
00411     if(pConfig%iConfigureSnow == CONFIG_SNOW_ORIGINAL_SWB) then
00412       call model_ProcessRain(pGrd, pConfig, pConfig%iDayOfYear, pConfig%iMonth)
00413     else if(pConfig%iConfigureSnow == CONFIG_SNOW_NEW_SWB) then
00414       call model_ProcessRainPRMS(pGrd, pConfig, pConfig%iDayOfYear, &
00415          pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iNumDaysInYear)
00416     else
00417       call Assert(lFALSE,"Unhandled snow module option specified", &
00418          TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
00419     end if
00420 
00421 #ifdef IRRIGATION_MODULE
00422     call update_irrigation_amounts(pGrd, pConfig)
00423 #endif
00424 
00425     call model_ProcessRunoff(pGrd, pConfig, pConfig%iDayOfYear, pConfig%iMonth)
00426 
00427     call model_ProcessET( pGrd, pConfig, pConfig%iDayOfYear, &
00428         pConfig%iNumDaysInYear, pTS%rRH, pTS%rMinRH, &
00429         pTS%rWindSpd, pTS%rSunPct )
00430 
00431     call model_ProcessSM( pGrd, pConfig, pConfig%iDayOfYear, &
00432        pConfig%iDay ,pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iYear)
00433 
00434     ! if desired, output daily mass balance file and daily model grids
00435     if(pConfig%lWriteToScreen) then
00436       call stats_DumpDailyAccumulatorValues(LU_STD_OUT, pConfig)
00437     else
00438       write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(a,i2.2,a,i2.2,a,i4.4)") &
00439         "Simulation day: ",pConfig%iMonth,"/", pConfig%iDay, "/", pConfig%iYear
00440     end if
00441 
00442     ! if desired, output daily mass balance file and daily model grids
00443     if ( pConfig%lReportDaily ) then
00444 
00445       call stats_WriteDailyAccumulatorValuesCSV(LU_CSV,pConfig%iMonth, &
00446          pConfig%iDay,pConfig%iYear)
00447 
00448       call stats_WriteMSBReport(pGrd,pConfig%iMonth,pConfig%iDay, &
00449          pConfig%iYear,pConfig%iDayOfYear)
00450 
00451     end if
00452 
00453     write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='("day",i3.3)' ) pConfig%iDayOfYear
00454     call model_WriteGrids(pGrd, pConfig, sBuf, pConfig%iDay, pConfig%iMonth, &
00455          pConfig%iYear, pConfig%iDayOfYear)
00456 
00457     ! Write the results at each month-end
00458     if ( lMonthEnd ) then
00459 
00460 !      if ( pConfig%lReportDaily ) call stats_CalcMonthlyMeans(pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iDay)
00461 !      call stats_WriteMonthlyReport (LU_STD_OUT, pGrd, sMonthName, iMonth)
00462       call model_WriteGrids(pGrd, pConfig, sMonthName,  pConfig%iDay, &
00463          pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iYear, pConfig%iDayOfYear)
00464 
00465       if ( pConfig%lWriteToScreen) call stats_DumpMonthlyAccumulatorValues(LU_STD_OUT, &
00466           pConfig%iMonth, sMonthName, pConfig)
00467 
00468       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT="(A,i2,A,i4)") &
00469           "finished monthly calculations for: ", &
00470               pConfig%iMonth, "/", pConfig%iYear
00471       flush(UNIT=LU_LOG)
00472 
00473     end if
00474 
00475     !-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00476     ! time control block follows; if next day is part of a new year, exit loop
00477     !-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00478     call gregorian_date(pConfig%iCurrentJulianDay + 1, &
00479             iTempYear, iTempMonth, iTempDay)
00480 
00481     if(pConfig%iYear /= iTempYear) then
00482       close(unit=LU_TS)
00483       exit MAIN_LOOP
00484     else
00485       pConfig%iMonth = iTempMonth
00486       pConfig%iDay = iTempDay
00487       pConfig%iCurrentJulianDay = pConfig%iCurrentJulianDay + 1
00488     end if
00489 
00490   end do MAIN_LOOP
00491 
00492   call model_WriteGrids(pGrd, pConfig, "ANNUAL", pConfig%iDay, &
00493      pConfig%iMonth, pConfig%iYear, pConfig%iDayOfYear)
00494 
00495   ! model_Solve has been called once... any further calls will not require
00496   !    re-initialization of data structures and data arrays
00497   pConfig%lFirstYearOfSimulation = lFALSE
00498 
00499   if(pConfig%lWriteToScreen) &
00500     call stats_DumpAnnualAccumulatorValues(LU_STD_OUT, pConfig, pConfig%iYear)
00501 
00502   call stats_WriteAnnualAccumulatorValuesCSV(LU_CSV_ANNUAL,pConfig%iYear)
00503 
00504   ! update value of last year
00505   if( .not. pConfig%lGriddedData) pConfig%iEndYear = pConfig%iYear
00506 
00507   DEALLOCATE(pTS, STAT=iStat)
00508   call Assert( iStat == 0, &
00509      "Could not deallocate memory for time-series data structure")
00510 
00511 end subroutine model_Solve
00512 
00513 !!***
00514 
00515 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00516 !!****s* model/model_EndOfRun
00517 ! NAME
00518 !   model_EndOfRun - Closes fortran files units and prints out elapsed runtime.
00519 !
00520 ! SYNOPSIS
00521 !   Closes fortran files units and prints out elapsed runtime.
00522 !
00523 ! INPUTS
00524 !   pConfig - Pointer to the model configuration data structure.
00525 !
00526 ! OUTPUTS
00527 !   NONE
00528 !
00529 ! NOTES
00530 !   Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
00531 !
00532 ! SOURCE
00533 
00534 subroutine model_EndOfRun(pGrd, pConfig, pGraph)
00535 
00536   ![ARGUMENTS]
00537   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: pGrd      ! Grid of model cells
00538   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig  ! pointer to data structure that contains
00539                                                     ! model options, flags, and other settings
00540   type (T_GRAPH_CONFIGURATION), dimension(:), pointer :: pGraph
00541        ! pointer to data structure that holds parameters for creating
00542        ! DISLIN plots
00543 
00544   ![LOCALS]
00545 #ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00546   type (T_NETCDF_FILE), pointer :: pNC
00547 #endif
00548   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNX, iNY        ! Grid dimensions
00549   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rX0, rY0          ! Lower-left corner (world coords)
00550   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rX1, rY1          ! Upper-right corner (world coords)
00551   integer (kind=T_INT) :: k
00552 
00553   ! trigger the call to reconstitute the output grids and plots from the
00554   ! compressed binary files, if desired
00555   if(.not. pConfig%lUseSWBRead) &
00556     call stats_RewriteGrids(pGrd%iNX, pGrd%iNY, pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rY0, pGrd%rX1, &
00557         pGrd%rY1, pConfig, pGraph)
00558 
00559   ! preserve grid dimensions before destroying model grid data structure
00560   iNX = pGrd%iNX
00561   iNY = pGrd%iNY
00562   rX0 = pGrd%rX0
00563   rY0 = pGrd%rY0
00564   rX1 = pGrd%rX1
00565   rY1 = pGrd%rY1
00566 
00567   ! destroy model grid to free up memory
00568   call grid_Destroy(pGrd)
00569 
00570   ! finalize and close any open NetCDF or binary output files
00571   do k=1,iNUM_VARIABLES
00572 
00573 #ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00574     ! close any NetCDF files that have been opened for output
00575     if(STAT_INFO(k)%iNetCDFOutput > iNONE ) then
00576 
00577       pNC => pConfig%NETCDF_FILE(k,iNC_OUTPUT)
00578       call netcdf_check(nf90_close(pNC%iNCID))
00579       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "model.f95: closed NetCDF file "// &
00580          TRIM(STAT_INFO(k)%sVARIABLE_NAME)//".nc"
00581       flush(unit=LU_LOG)
00582 
00583     end if
00584 
00585 #endif
00586 
00587     ! write the end date of the simulation into the header of
00588     ! the binary file (*.bin)
00589     if(STAT_INFO(k)%iDailyOutput > iNONE &
00590        .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iMonthlyOutput > iNONE &
00591        .or. STAT_INFO(k)%iAnnualOutput > iNONE)  then
00592       write(UNIT=STAT_INFO(k)%iLU,POS=iENDDATE_POS) &
00593         pConfig%iMonth,pConfig%iDay, pConfig%iYear
00594     end if
00595 
00596   end do
00597 
00598   ! clean up
00599   close ( unit=LU_TS )
00600   if ( pConfig%lReportDaily ) then
00601     close ( unit=LU_MSB_REPORT )
00602     close ( unit=LU_CSV )
00603     close ( unit=LU_CSV_ANNUAL )
00604   end if
00605 
00606   ! close any remaining binary output files
00607   call stats_CloseBinaryFiles()
00608 
00609   ! how long did all this take, anyway?
00610   call cpu_time(rEndTime)
00611   print "(//1x,'SWB run completed in: ',f10.2,' minutes')", &
00612     (rEndTime-rStartTime)/60.0_T_SGL
00613   write(unit=LU_LOG,fmt="(//1x,'SWB run completed in: ',f10.2, ' minutes')"), &
00614     (rEndTime-rStartTime)/60.0_T_SGL
00615 
00616   return
00617 end subroutine model_EndOfRun
00618 
00619 !!***
00620 
00621 
00622 subroutine model_GetDynamicLanduseValue( pGrd, pConfig, iYear)
00623   !! Populates annual dynamic landuse value on a cell-by-cell basis
00624   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
00625   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
00626   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00627                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00628   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iYear
00629   ! [ LOCALS ]
00630   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: input_grd      ! Pointer to temporary grid for I/O
00631   character (len=256) sBuf
00632 
00633   input_grd=>null()
00634 
00635   write(unit=LU_LOG,fmt="('Reading dynamic landuse data from file: '," &
00636      //"A,'_',i4,'.',A)") trim(pConfig%sDynamicLanduseFilePrefix), &
00637      iYear,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00638 
00639   select case( pConfig%iConfigureLanduse )
00640     case( CONFIG_LANDUSE_DYNAMIC_ARC_GRID )
00641       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i4,".",A)' ) &
00642          trim(pConfig%sDynamicLanduseFilePrefix), iYear,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00643       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "ARC_GRID", T_INT_GRID )
00644       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00645                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00646       pGrd%Cells%iLanduse = input_grd%iData
00647       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00648     case( CONFIG_LANDUSE_DYNAMIC_SURFER )
00649       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i4,".",A)' ) &
00650          trim(pConfig%sDynamicLanduseFilePrefix), iYear,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00651       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "SURFER", T_INT_GRID )
00652       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00653                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00654       pGrd%Cells%iLanduse = input_grd%iData
00655       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00656 !#ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00657 !    case( CONFIG_LANDUSE_DYNAMIC_NETCDF )
00658 !call netcdf_read( iGROSS_PRECIP, iNC_INPUT, pConfig, pGrd, input_grd, &
00659 !         JULIAN_DAY(iYear, iMonth, iDay))
00660 !      pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip = input_grd%rData
00661 !      call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00662 !#endif
00663 
00664     case default
00665         call Assert ( lFALSE, "Internal error -- unknown landuse input type" )
00666   end select
00667 
00668 end subroutine model_GetDynamicLanduseValue
00669

00671 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00672 !!****s* model/model_GetDailyPrecipValue
00673 ! NAME
00674 !   model_GetDailyPrecipValue - Copies precipitation values into
00675 !                               the cell-by-cell data structure.
00676 !
00677 ! SYNOPSIS
00678 !   Populates the gross precipitation value on a cell-by-cell basis.
00679 !   If gridded precipitation data are used, this subroutine reads in the
00680 !   daily precipitation grid and copies the values into the cell-by-cell
00681 !   data structure.
00682 !
00683 ! INPUTS
00684 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
00685 !   pConfig - Pointer to the model configuration data structure.
00686 !   rPrecip - Daily precipitation amount read in by model_Solve.
00687 !   iDayOfYear - Day of the current year (January 1 = 1).
00688 !   iMonth - Month corresponding to the current model day (January = 1).
00689 !
00690 ! OUTPUTS
00691 !   NONE
00692 !
00693 ! NOTES
00694 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
00695 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
00696 !       of pointers.
00697 !
00698 ! SOURCE
00699 
00700 subroutine model_GetDailyPrecipValue( pGrd, pConfig, rPrecip, iMonth, iDay, iYear)
00701   !! Populates Gross precipitation value on a cell-by-cell basis
00702   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
00703   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
00704   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00705                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00706   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rPrecip
00707   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonth
00708   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iDay
00709   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iYear
00710   ! [ LOCALS ]
00711   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: input_grd      ! Pointer to temporary grid for I/O
00712   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMin, rMean, rMax, rSum
00713   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCount, iNegCount
00714   character (len=256) sBuf
00715 
00716   input_grd=>null()
00717 
00718   select case( pConfig%iConfigurePrecip )
00719     case( CONFIG_PRECIP_SINGLE_STATION)
00720       pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rGrossPrecip = rPrecip  ! use a single value for entire grid
00721     case( CONFIG_PRECIP_ARC_GRID )
00722       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i4,"_",i2.2,"_",i2.2,".",A)' ) &
00723          trim(pConfig%sPrecipFilePrefix), iYear,iMonth,iDay,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00724       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "ARC_GRID", T_SGL_GRID )
00725       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00726                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00727       pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip = input_grd%rData
00728       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00729     case( CONFIG_PRECIP_SURFER_GRID )
00730       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i4,"_",i2.2,"_",i2.2,".",A)' ) &
00731          trim(pConfig%sPrecipFilePrefix), iYear,iMonth,iDay,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00732       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "SURFER", T_SGL_GRID )
00733       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00734                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00735       pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip = input_grd%rData
00736       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00737 #ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00738     case( CONFIG_PRECIP_NETCDF )
00739 call netcdf_read( iGROSS_PRECIP, iNC_INPUT, pConfig, pGrd, input_grd, &
00740          JULIAN_DAY(iYear, iMonth, iDay))
00741       pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip = input_grd%rData
00742       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00743 #endif
00744 
00745     case default
00746         call Assert ( lFALSE, "Internal error -- unknown precipitation input type" )
00747   end select
00748 
00749   where (pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip < pConfig%rMinValidPrecip)
00750     pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip = rZERO
00751   end where
00752 
00753   rMin = minval(pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip)
00754   rMax = maxval(pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip)
00755   rSum = sum(pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip)
00756   iCount = size(pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip)
00757   iNegCount = COUNT(pGrd%Cells%rGrossPrecip<rZERO)
00758 
00759   call Assert(LOGICAL(rMin >= rZERO,T_LOGICAL), 
00760     "Negative or missing precipitation values are not allowed. " 
00761     //"("//trim(int2char(iNegCount))//" cells with values < 0.0)")
00762 
00763   if(iCount>0) then
00764     rMean = rSum / iCount
00765   else
00766     rMean = -9999.
00767   end if
00768 
00769   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByGrid(rMin,rMean,rMax,rSum,iGROSS_PRECIP,iMonth)
00770 
00771 end subroutine model_GetDailyPrecipValue
00772 
00773 !!***
00774 
00775 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00776 !!****s* model/model_GetDailyTemperatureValue
00777 ! NAME
00778 !   model_GetDailyTemperatureValue - Copies precipitation values into
00779 !                               the cell-by-cell data structure.
00780 !
00781 ! SYNOPSIS
00782 !   Populates the minimum, maximum, and average temperature values
00783 !   on a cell-by-cell basis.
00784 !
00785 !   If gridded temperature data are used, this subroutine reads in the
00786 !   daily minimum and maximum temperature grid and copies the values
00787 !   into the cell-by-cell data structure.
00788 !
00789 ! INPUTS
00790 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
00791 !   pConfig - Pointer to the model configuration data structure.
00792 !   rAvgT - Average daily temperature in Fahrenheit.
00793 !   rMinT - Minimum daily temperature in Fahrenheit.
00794 !   rMaxT - Maximum daily temperature in Fahrenheit.
00795 !   iMonth - Month corresponding to the current model day (January = 1).
00796 !   iDay - Day of month
00797 !   iYear - Year
00798 !
00799 ! OUTPUTS
00800 !   NONE
00801 !
00802 ! NOTES
00803 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
00804 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
00805 !       of pointers.
00806 !
00807 ! SOURCE
00808 
00809 subroutine model_GetDailyTemperatureValue( pGrd, pConfig, rAvgT, rMinT, &
00810      rMaxT, rRH, iMonth, iDay, iYear)
00811 
00812   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
00813   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
00814   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00815                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00816   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rAvgT
00817   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rMinT
00818   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rMaxT
00819   real (kind=T_SGL), intent(in) :: rRH
00820   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonth
00821   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iDay
00822   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iYear
00823   ! [ LOCALS ]
00824   type (T_GENERAL_GRID),pointer :: input_grd      ! Pointer to temporary grid for I/O
00825   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMin, rMean, rMax, rSum, rTFactor, rTempVal
00826   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumGridCells
00827   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iRow,iCol
00828   character (len=256) sBuf
00829   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel
00830 
00831   input_grd=>null()
00832 
00833   select case( pConfig%iConfigureTemperature )
00834     case( CONFIG_TEMPERATURE_SINGLE_STATION)
00835       pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMin = rMinT  ! use a single value for entire grid
00836       pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTMax = rMaxT
00837       pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rTAvg = rAvgT
00838 
00839       !! Adjust cell-by-cell temperature
00840       if ( pconfig%lElevAdjustment ) then
00841         do iCol=1, pGrd%iNY
00842           do iRow=1, pGrd%iNX
00843             cel => pGrd%Cells(iCol,iRow)
00844             if ( pConfig%rElevHumidityThreshold > 9990.0_T_SGL .or. rRH < 0.0_T_SGL ) then
00845               rTFactor = pConfig%rElevDryFactor
00846             else if ( rRH < pConfig%rElevHumidityThreshold ) then
00847               rTFactor = pConfig%rElevDryFactor
00848             else
00849               rTFactor = pConfig%rElevHumidFactor
00850             end if
00851             cel%rTMin = cel%rTMin - rTFactor * (cel%rElevation - pconfig%rElevStationElevation)
00852             cel%rTMax = cel%rTMax - rTFactor * (cel%rElevation - pconfig%rElevStationElevation)
00853             cel%rTAvg = cel%rTAvg - rTFactor * (cel%rElevation - pconfig%rElevStationElevation)
00854           end do
00855         end do
00856       end if
00857 
00858     case( CONFIG_TEMPERATURE_ARC_GRID )
00859       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i4,"_",i2.2,"_",i2.2,".",A)' ) &
00860          trim(pConfig%sTMINFilePrefix), iYear,iMonth,iDay,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00861       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "ARC_GRID", T_SGL_GRID )
00862       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00863                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00864       pGrd%Cells%rTMin = input_grd%rData
00865       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00866       input_grd=>null()
00867 
00868       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i4,"_",i2.2,"_",i2.2,".",A)' ) &
00869          trim(pConfig%sTMAXFilePrefix), iYear,iMonth,iDay,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00870       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "ARC_GRID", T_SGL_GRID )
00871       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00872                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00873       pGrd%Cells%rTMax = input_grd%rData
00874       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00875 
00876       pGrd%Cells%rTAvg = (pGrd%Cells%rTMax + pGrd%Cells%rTMin) / 2_T_SGL
00877 
00878     case( CONFIG_TEMPERATURE_SURFER_GRID )
00879       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i2.2,"_",i2.2,"_",i4,".",A)' ) &
00880          trim(pConfig%sTMINFilePrefix), iMonth,iDay,iYear,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00881       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "SURFER", T_SGL_GRID )
00882       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00883                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00884       pGrd%Cells%rTMin = input_grd%rData
00885       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00886       input_grd=>null()
00887 
00888       write ( unit=sBuf, fmt='(A,"_",i2.2,"_",i2.2,"_",i4,".",A)' ) &
00889          trim(pConfig%sTMAXFilePrefix), iMonth,iDay,iYear,trim(pConfig%sOutputFileSuffix)
00890       input_grd => grid_Read( sBuf, "SURFER", T_SGL_GRID )
00891       call Assert( grid_Conform( pGrd, input_grd ), &
00892                       "Non-conforming grid - filename: " // sBuf )
00893       pGrd%Cells%rTMax = input_grd%rData
00894       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00895 
00896       pGrd%Cells%rTAvg = (pGrd%Cells%rTMax + pGrd%Cells%rTMin) / 2_T_SGL
00897 
00898 #ifdef NETCDF_SUPPORT
00899     case( CONFIG_TEMPERATURE_NETCDF )
00900       call netcdf_read( iMAX_TEMP, iNC_INPUT, pConfig, pGrd, input_grd, JULIAN_DAY(iYear, iMonth, iDay))
00901       pGrd%Cells%rTMax = input_grd%rData
00902       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00903 
00904       call netcdf_read( iMIN_TEMP, iNC_INPUT, pConfig, pGrd, input_grd, JULIAN_DAY(iYear, iMonth, iDay))
00905       pGrd%Cells%rTMin = input_grd%rData
00906       call grid_Destroy( input_grd )
00907 
00908       pGrd%Cells%rTAvg = (pGrd%Cells%rTMax + pGrd%Cells%rTMin) / 2_T_SGL
00909 #endif
00910 
00911     case default
00912         call Assert ( lFALSE, "Internal error -- unknown temperature input type" )
00913   end select
00914 
00915 
00916   ! calculate number of cells in model grid
00917   iNumGridCells = pGrd%iNX * pGrd%iNY
00918 
00919   ! Scan through array of inputs looking for instances where the TMIN > TMAX
00920   ! (THIS CAN BE RE_WRITTEN USING MATRIX NOTATION)
00921 
00922   !$OMP DO
00923 
00924 
00925   do iCol=1,pGrd%iNX
00926     do iRow=1,pGrd%iNY
00927 
00928       cel=>pGrd%Cells(iRow,iCol)
00929 
00930       if( cel%rTMax < cel%rTMin )then
00931 
00932         ! swap min and max values to maintain a positive delta T
00933         rTempVal = cel%rTMax
00934         cel%rTMax = cel%rTMin
00935         cel%rTMin = cel%rTMax
00936 
00937       end if
00938     end do
00939   end do
00940 
00941   !$OMP END DO
00942 
00943 end subroutine model_GetDailyTemperatureValue
00944 !!***
00945 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00946 !!****s* model/model_UpdateContinuousFrozenGroundIndex( pGrd )
00947 ! NAME
00948 !   model_UpdateContinuousFrozenGroundIndex - Updates the continuous
00949 !                               frozen ground index on a cell-by-cell basis.
00950 ! SYNOPSIS
00951 !   Updates the continuous frozen ground index (CFGI)
00952 !   on a cell-by-cell basis.
00953 !
00954 ! INPUTS
00955 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
00956 !
00957 ! OUTPUTS
00958 !   NONE
00959 !
00960 ! NOTES
00961 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
00962 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
00963 !       of pointers.
00964 !
00965 ! SOURCE
00966 
00967 subroutine model_UpdateContinuousFrozenGroundIndex( pGrd , pConfig)
00968 
00969   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
00970   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
00971   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
00972                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
00973 
00974   ! [ LOCALS ]
00975   real (kind=T_SGL) :: A = 0.97             ! decay coefficient
00976   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCol,iRow               ! temporary array indices
00977   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel              ! pointer to a particular cell
00978   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTAvg_C              ! temporary variable holding avg temp in C
00979   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rSnowDepthCM         ! snow depth in centimeters
00980 
00981   !$OMP DO
00982 
00983   do iCol=1,pGrd%iNX
00984     do iRow=1,pGrd%iNY
00985       cel => pGrd%Cells(iRow,iCol)
00986       rTAvg_C = FtoC(cel%rTAvg)
00987       ! assuming snow depth is 10 times the water content of the snow in inches
00988       rSnowDepthCM = cel%rSnowCover * 10.0_T_SGL * rCM_PER_INCH
00989 
00990       if(cel%rTAvg > rFREEZING) then
00991         cel%rCFGI = max(A*cel%rCFGI - &
00992                     (rTAvg_C * exp (-0.4_T_SGL * 0.5_T_SGL * rSnowDepthCM)),rZERO)
00993       else ! temperature is below freezing
00994         cel%rCFGI = max(A*cel%rCFGI - &
00995                     (rTAvg_C * exp (-0.4_T_SGL * 0.08_T_SGL * rSnowDepthCM)),rZERO)
00996       end if
00997 
00998     end do
00999   end do
01000 
01001   !$OMP END DO
01002 
01003 !  write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "=========CFGI CALCULATION==========="
01004 !  write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT="(A)") &
01005 !      "                                 min          mean           max"
01006 !  call stats_WriteMinMeanMax(LU_STD_OUT,"CFGI" , pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rCFGI )
01007 !
01008 !  write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "=========CFGI CALCULATION==========="
01009 
01010 
01011 
01012 end subroutine model_UpdateContinuousFrozenGroundIndex
01013 
01014 
01015 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01016 !!****s* model/model_UpdateGrowingDegreeDay( pGrd )
01017 ! NAME
01018 !   model_UpdateGrowingDegreeDay - Updates the growing degree-day
01019 !                                  on a cell-by-cell basis.
01020 ! SYNOPSIS
01021 !   Updates the growing degree-day
01022 !   on a cell-by-cell basis.
01023 !
01024 ! INPUTS
01025 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
01026 !
01027 ! OUTPUTS
01028 !   NONE
01029 !
01030 ! NOTES
01031 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
01032 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
01033 !       of pointers.
01034 !
01035 ! SOURCE
01036 
01037 #ifdef IRRIGATION_MODULE
01038 
01039 subroutine model_UpdateGrowingDegreeDay( pGrd , pConfig)
01040 
01041   implicit none
01042 
01043   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
01044   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
01045   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01046                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01047   ! [ LOCALS ]
01048   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rDD                        ! daily departure from TBase
01049   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel                      ! pointer to a particular cell
01050   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rA, rAt
01051   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTMax
01052   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rW
01053   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCol,iRow
01054 
01055   ! zero out growing degree day at start of calendar year
01056   if(pConfig%iDayOfYear == 1) pGrd%Cells%rGDD = 0.
01057 
01058   do iCol=1,pGrd%iNX  ! last subscript in a Fortran array should be the slowest-changing
01059     do iRow=1,pGrd%iNY
01060       cel => pGrd%Cells(iRow,iCol)
01061 
01062       ! cap the maximum value used in GDD calculations on the basis of the value
01063       ! provided by user...
01064       rTMax = min(cel%rGDD_TMax, cel%rTMax)
01065 
01066       if(rTMax <= cel%rGDD_TBase) then
01067 
01068         rDD = 0.
01069 
01070       elseif(cel%rTMin >= cel%rGDD_TBase) then
01071 
01072         rDD = cel%rTAvg - cel%rGDD_TBase
01073 
01074       else
01075 
01076         rW = (rTMax - cel%rTMin) / 2.
01077 
01078         rAt = ( cel%rGDD_TBase - cel%rTAvg) / rW
01079 
01080         if(rAt > 1) rAt = 1.
01081         if(rAt < -1) rAt = -1.
01082 
01083         rA = asin(rAt)
01084 
01085         rDD = (( rW * cos(rA)) - ((cel%rGDD_TBase - cel%rTAvg) &
01086                           * ((rPI / 2.) - rA))) / rPI
01087 
01088       end if
01089 
01090       cel%rGDD = cel%rGDD + rDD
01091 
01092     end do
01093 
01094   end do
01095 
01096 end subroutine model_UpdateGrowingDegreeDay
01097 
01098 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01099 !!****s* model/model_InitializeGrowingDegreeDay( pGrd )
01100 ! NAME
01101 !   model_InitializeGrowingDegreeDay - Initializes the growing degree-day
01102 !                                  on a cell-by-cell basis.
01103 ! SYNOPSIS
01104 !   Initializes the growing degree-day
01105 !   on a cell-by-cell basis.
01106 !
01107 ! INPUTS
01108 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
01109 !
01110 ! OUTPUTS
01111 !   NONE
01112 !
01113 ! NOTES
01114 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
01115 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
01116 !       of pointers.
01117 !
01118 ! SOURCE
01119 
01120 subroutine model_InitializeGrowingDegreeDay( pGrd , pConfig)
01121 
01122   implicit none
01123 
01124   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
01125   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
01126   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01127                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01128   ! [ LOCALS ]
01129   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rDD                        ! daily departure from TBase
01130   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel                      ! pointer to a particular cell
01131   type (T_IRRIGATION_LOOKUP),pointer :: pIRRIGATION  ! pointer to an irrigation table entry
01132   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rA, rAt
01133   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTMax
01134   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rW
01135   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCol,iRow
01136 
01137   do iCol=1,pGrd%iNX  ! last subscript in a Fortran array should be the slowest-changing
01138     do iRow=1,pGrd%iNY
01139       cel => pGrd%Cells(iRow,iCol)
01140       pIRRIGATION => pConfig%IRRIGATION(cel%iLandUseIndex)
01141 
01142       ! transfer table values to the grid cell
01143       cel%rGDD_TMax = pIRRIGATION%rGDD_MaxTemp
01144       cel%rGDD_TBase = pIRRIGATION%rGDD_BaseTemp
01145 
01146     end do
01147 
01148   end do
01149 
01150 end subroutine model_InitializeGrowingDegreeDay
01151 
01152 #endif
01153 
01154 !!***
01155 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01156 !!****s* model/model_ProcessRain
01157 ! NAME
01158 !   model_ProcessRain - Processes the daily rainfall. Upon return, the
01159 !                       daily precipitation is corrected to account for
01160 !                       snow accumulation / snowmelt.
01161 !
01162 ! SYNOPSIS
01163 !   Processes daily precipitation values. Daily precipitation values
01164 !   are altered to account for interception and with regard to the
01165 !   form that the precipitation takes (rain or snow). If the form of the
01166 !   precipitation is snow, the net precipitation value is zeroed out, and
01167 !   the precipitation value is moved into the snowfall value.
01168 !
01169 ! INPUTS
01170 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
01171 !   pConfig - Pointer to the model configuration data structure.
01172 !   iDayOfYear - Day of the current year (January 1 = 1).
01173 !   iMonth - Month corresponding to the current model day (January = 1).
01174 !
01175 ! OUTPUTS
01176 !   NONE
01177 !
01178 ! NOTES
01179 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
01180 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
01181 !       of pointers.
01182 !
01183 ! SOURCE
01184 
01185 subroutine model_ProcessRain( pGrd, pConfig, iDayOfYear, iMonth)
01186 
01187   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
01188   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
01189   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01190                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01191   integer (kind=T_INT),intent(in) :: iDayOfYear  ! Day of the year
01192   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonth     ! Integer month value (1-12)
01193   ! [ LOCALS ]
01194   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rPotentialMelt,rPotentialInterception,rInterception
01195   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rPreviousSnowCover,rChgInSnowCover
01196   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iRow,iCol
01197   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel
01198   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumGridCells
01199   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMin, rMean, rMax, rSum, rSum2
01200   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iRowCount
01201   real (kind=T_SGL) ::  rMonthlySnowRunoff
01202   logical (kind=T_LOGICAL) :: lFREEZING
01203 
01204   ! [ LOCAL PARAMETERS ]
01205   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rMELT_INDEX = 1.5_T_SGL
01206 
01207   ! set snowmelt to zero uniformly across model grid
01208   pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rSnowMelt = rZERO
01209 
01210   ! set snowfall to zero uniformly across model grid
01211   pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rSnowWaterEquiv = rZERO
01212 
01213   ! calculate number of cells in model grid
01214   iNumGridCells = pGrd%iNX * pGrd%iNY
01215 
01216 !  pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rPrevious_SnowCover = pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rSnowCover
01217 
01218   ! Use "potential interception" for each cell to compute net precip
01219   do iCol=1,pGrd%iNX
01220     do iRow=1,pGrd%iNY
01221 
01222      cel => pGrd%Cells(iRow,iCol)
01223 
01224      ! allow for correction factor to be applied to precip gage input data
01225      if ( cel%rTAvg - (cel%rTMax-cel%rTMin)/3.0_T_SGL <= rFREEZING ) then
01226        lFREEZING = lTRUE
01227        cel%rGrossPrecip = cel%rGrossPrecip * pConfig%rSnowWaterEquiv_Corr_Factor
01228      else
01229        lFREEZING = lFALSE
01230        cel%rGrossPrecip = cel%rGrossPrecip * pConfig%rRainfall_Corr_Factor
01231      end if
01232 
01233       rPotentialInterception = rf_model_GetInterception(pConfig,cel%iLandUse,iDayOfYear)
01234 
01235       rPreviousSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover
01236 
01237       cel%rNetPrecip = cel%rGrossPrecip-rPotentialInterception
01238       if ( cel%rNetPrecip < rZERO ) cel%rNetPrecip = rZERO
01239       rInterception = cel%rGrossPrecip - cel%rNetPrecip
01240 
01241       call Assert(LOGICAL(rInterception >= rZERO,kind=T_LOGICAL), 
01242          "Negative value for interception was calculated on day " 
01243          //int2char(iDayOfYear)//" iRow: "//trim(int2char(iRow))//"  iCol: "//trim(int2char(iCol)))
01244 
01245       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(REAL(rInterception,kind=T_DBL), 
01246           iINTERCEPTION,iMonth,iZERO)
01247 
01248      if(STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iDailyOutput > iNONE &
01249        .or. STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iMonthlyOutput > iNONE &
01250        .or. STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iAnnualOutput > iNONE)  then
01251         call RLE_writeByte(STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iLU, &
01252            rInterception, pConfig%iRLE_MULT, pConfig%rRLE_OFFSET, &
01253            iNumGridCells, iINTERCEPTION)
01254      end if
01255 
01256 !      cel%rAnnualInterception = cel%rAnnualInterception + cel%rInterception
01257 !      rMonthlyInterception = rMonthlyInterception + cel%rInterception
01258 
01259       ! Is it snowing?
01260       if (lFREEZING ) then
01261         cel%rSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover + cel%rNetPrecip
01262 !         rMonthlySnowFall = rMonthlySnowFall + sum(pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rNetPrecip)
01263         cel%rSnowWaterEquiv = cel%rNetPrecip
01264         cel%rNetPrecip = rZERO      ! For now -- if there is snowmelt, we do it next
01265       end if
01266       ! Is there any melting?
01267       if(cel%rTAvg>rFREEZING) then
01268         rPotentialMelt = rMELT_INDEX * ( cel%rTMax-rFREEZING )*rC_PER_F / rMM_PER_INCH
01269         if(cel%rSnowCover > rPotentialMelt) then
01270           cel%rSnowMelt = rPotentialMelt
01271           cel%rSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover - rPotentialMelt
01272         else
01273           cel%rSnowMelt = cel%rSnowCover
01274           cel%rSnowCover = rZERO
01275         end if
01276       end if
01277 
01278       rChgInSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover - rPreviousSnowCover
01279 
01280       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01281         REAL(rChgInSnowCover,kind=T_DBL), iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV,iMonth,iZERO)
01282       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01283         REAL(cel%rNetPrecip,kind=T_DBL),iNET_PRECIP,iMonth,iZERO)
01284       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01285         REAL(cel%rSnowMelt,kind=T_DBL),iSNOWMELT,iMonth,iZERO)
01286       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01287         REAL(cel%rSnowWaterEquiv,kind=T_DBL),iSNOWFALL,iMonth,iZERO)
01288       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01289         REAL(cel%rSnowCover,kind=T_DBL),iSNOWCOVER,iMonth,iZERO)
01290 
01291     end do
01292   end do
01293 
01294   ! a call to the UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell subroutine with a value of "iNumGridCalls"
01295   ! as the final argument triggers the routine to update monthly and annual stats
01296   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01297   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iINTERCEPTION,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01298   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iNET_PRECIP,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01299   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iSNOWMELT,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01300   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iSNOWFALL,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01301   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iSNOWCOVER,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01302 
01303   return
01304 
01305 end subroutine model_ProcessRain
01306 
01307 !----------------------------------------------------------------------
01308 
01309 subroutine model_ProcessRainPRMS( pGrd, pConfig, iDayOfYear, iMonth, iNumDaysInYear)
01310 
01311   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
01312   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd        ! pointer to model grid
01313   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01314                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01315   integer (kind=T_INT),intent(in) :: iDayOfYear  ! Day of the year
01316   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonth     ! Integer month value (1-12)
01317   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iNumDaysInYear
01318 
01319   ! [ LOCALS ]
01320   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rPotentialMelt,rPotentialInterception,rInterception
01321   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rPreviousSnowCover,rChgInSnowCover
01322   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCol,iRow
01323   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel
01324   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumGridCells
01325   real (kind=T_DBL) :: rMin, rMean, rMax, rSum, rSum2
01326   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCount
01327   real (kind=T_SGL) ::  rMonthlySnowRunoff
01328   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rFracRain
01329   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTd, rTempDifference
01330   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rDelta,rOmega_s,rD_r, rRa, rRs, rRn_mean, rN
01331   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rRso, rRns, rRnl, rRn, rZenithAngle
01332   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rLatitude
01333   real (kind=T_SGL) :: rTempComp, rRadComp
01334   logical (kind=T_LOGICAL), parameter :: lENERGY_BALANCE = lFALSE
01335 
01336   ! [ LOCAL PARAMETERS ]
01337   ! from eqn 2, Kustas and Rango, 1994
01338   ! value of 0.2 for A_sub_r from Brubaker et al 1996 (Snowmelt Runoff Model)
01339   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rA_sub_r = 0.2_T_SGL   ! cm per degree C
01340   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rM_sub_Q = 0.026_T_SGL  ! cm/day per W/m**2
01341 
01342   ! Bastardized values below....
01343 !  real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rA_sub_r = 0.27_T_SGL   ! cm per degree C
01344 !  real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rM_sub_Q = 0.0040_T_SGL  ! cm/day per W/m**2
01345 
01346   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rAlbedoInit = 0.965   ! Kustas et al
01347   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rElevation = 1500
01348   real (kind=T_SGL), parameter :: rMeltInitTemperature = 31.5_T_SGL
01349 
01350   ! set snowmelt to zero uniformly across model grid
01351 !  pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rSnowMelt = rZERO
01352 
01353   ! set snowfall to zero uniformly across model grid
01354  ! pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rSnowWaterEquiv = rZERO
01355 
01356   ! calculate number of cells in model grid
01357   iNumGridCells = pGrd%iNX * pGrd%iNY
01358 
01359 !  pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rPrevious_SnowCover = pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rSnowCover
01360 
01361   rD_r =rel_Earth_Sun_dist(iDayOfYear,iNumDaysInYear)
01362   rDelta = solar_declination(iDayOfYear, iNumDaysInYear)
01363 
01364    do iRow=1,pGrd%iNY
01365 
01366     rLatitude = row_latitude(pConfig%rNorthernLatitude, &
01367            pConfig%rSouthernLatitude, pGrd%iNY, iRow)
01368     rOmega_s = sunset_angle(rLatitude, rDelta)
01369     rN = daylight_hours(rOmega_s)
01370 
01371     ! NOTE that the following equation returns extraterrestrial radiation in
01372     ! MJ / m**2 / day.
01373     rRa = extraterrestrial_radiation_Ra(rLatitude,rDelta,rOmega_s,rD_r)
01374     rRso = clear_sky_solar_radiation_Rso(rRa)
01375     rZenithAngle = zenith_angle(rLatitude, rDelta)
01376 
01377     !$OMP DO
01378 
01379     ! determine the fraction of precip that falls as snow
01380     do iCol=1,pGrd%iNX
01381 
01382       cel => pGrd%Cells(iRow,iCol)
01383 
01384       ! initialize accumulators for this cell
01385       cel%rSnowMelt = rZERO
01386       cel%rSnowWaterEquiv = rZERO
01387       cel%rSnowFall = rZERO
01388 
01389       if(cel%rTMin > pConfig%rTMaxAllSnow &
01390          .or. cel%rTMax > pConfig%rTMaxAllRain) then
01391 
01392         rFracRain = rONE
01393         cel%iDaysSinceLastSnow = cel%iDaysSinceLastSnow + 1
01394 
01395       else if(cel%rTMax < pConfig%rTMaxAllSnow) then
01396 
01397         rFracRain = rZERO
01398         cel%iDaysSinceLastSnow = 0
01399 
01400       else
01401 
01402         ! this is straight from MMS/PRMS
01403         rFracRain = ((cel%rTMax - pConfig%rTMaxAllSnow) &
01404            / (cel%rTMax - cel%rTMin))
01405         cel%iDaysSinceLastSnow = 0
01406 
01407       end if
01408 
01409       cel%rGrossPrecip = rFracRain * cel%rGrossPrecip * pConfig%rRainfall_Corr_Factor &
01410        + (rONE - rFracRain) * cel%rGrossPrecip * pConfig%rSnowWaterEquiv_Corr_Factor
01411 
01412       rPotentialInterception = rf_model_GetInterception(pConfig,cel%iLandUse,iDayOfYear)
01413 
01414       rPreviousSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover
01415 
01416       cel%rNetPrecip = MAX(cel%rGrossPrecip-rPotentialInterception,rZERO)
01417       rInterception = MAX(cel%rGrossPrecip - cel%rNetPrecip,rZERO)
01418 
01419       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(REAL(rInterception,kind=T_DBL), 
01420           iINTERCEPTION,iMonth,iZERO)
01421 
01422      if(STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iDailyOutput > iNONE &
01423        .or. STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iMonthlyOutput > iNONE &
01424        .or. STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iAnnualOutput > iNONE)  then
01425         call RLE_writeByte(STAT_INFO(iINTERCEPTION)%iLU, &
01426            REAL(rInterception,kind=T_SGL), pConfig%iRLE_MULT, pConfig%rRLE_OFFSET, 
01427            iNumGridCells, iINTERCEPTION)
01428      end if
01429 
01430 !      cel%rAnnualInterception = cel%rAnnualInterception + cel%rInterception
01431 !      rMonthlyInterception = rMonthlyInterception + cel%rInterception
01432 
01433        cel%rSnowWaterEquiv = cel%rNetPrecip * (rONE - rFracRain)
01434        cel%rSnowFall = cel%rSnowWaterEquiv * snow_depth_Hedstrom(cel%rTAvg, pConfig)
01435        cel%rSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover + cel%rSnowWaterEquiv
01436        cel%rNetPrecip = cel%rNetPrecip - cel%rSnowWaterEquiv
01437 
01438       if(cel%rSnowCover > rNEAR_ZERO) then  ! no point in calculating all this
01439                                             ! unless there is snowcover present
01440 
01441         rRs = solar_radiation_Hargreaves_Rs(rRa, cel%rTMin, cel%rTMax) ! &
01442 
01443         cel%rSnowAlbedo = snow_albedo(rAlbedoInit, cel%iDaysSinceLastSnow, &
01444                       rZenithAngle)
01445 
01446         if(lENERGY_BALANCE) then
01447 
01448           call snow_energy_balance(cel%rTMin, cel%rTMax, &
01449              cel%rTAvg, rRs, rRso, cel%rSnowAlbedo, cel%rSnowCover, &
01450              cel%rNetPrecip, cel%rSnowTemperature, cel%rSnowMelt, iCol,iRow)
01451 
01452         else
01453 
01454           ! amount average temperature exceeds freezing point
01455           rTempDifference = FtoC(cel%rTAvg) - FtoC(rMeltInitTemperature)
01456           rTd = max(rTempDifference,rZERO)
01457 
01458           rRns = net_shortwave_radiation_Rns(rRs, cel%rSnowAlbedo)
01459 
01460           rRnl = net_longwave_radiation_Rnl(cel%rTMin, cel%rTMax, rRs, rRso)
01461 
01462           rRn = rRns - rRnl
01463 
01464           rTempComp = rA_sub_r * rTd / rCM_PER_INCH
01465 
01466           rRadComp = max(rM_sub_Q * rRn * 11.57  / rCM_PER_INCH,rZERO)
01467 
01468           rPotentialMelt = rTempComp + rRadComp
01469 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
01470           if(iCol > 3 .and. iCol < 5 .and. iRow > 20 .and. iRow < 22) then
01471             write(*,FMT="('Snow albedo:',t32,F14.3)") cel%rSnowAlbedo
01472             write(*,FMT="('Extraterrestrial radiation (Ra):',t32,F14.3)") rRa
01473             write(*,FMT="('Incoming shortwave (Rs):',t32,F14.3)") rRs
01474             write(*,FMT="('Clear sky shortwave (Rso):',t32,F14.3)") rRso
01475             write(*,FMT="('Zenith angle :',t32,F14.3)") rZenithAngle
01476             write(*,FMT="('Net shortwave (Rns):',t32,F14.3)") rRns
01477             write(*,FMT="('Net longwave (Rnl):',t32,F14.3)") rRnl
01478             write(*,FMT="('Net shortwave + longwave (Rn):',t32,F14.3)") rRn
01479             write(*,FMT="('Amount temp > 0 (rTd):',t32,F14.3)") rTd
01480             write(*,FMT="('Average temp  (rTAvg):',t32,F14.3)") cel%rTAvg
01481             write(*,FMT="('Temp Difference:',t32,F14.3)") rTempDifference
01482             write(*,FMT="('Snowcover (SWE, inches):',t32,F14.3)") cel%rSnowCover
01483             write(*,FMT="('Potential snowmelt (temp):',t32,F14.3)") rTempComp
01484             write(*,FMT="('Potential snowmelt (rad):',t32,F14.3)") rRadComp
01485             write(*,FMT="('Potential snowmelt:',t32,F14.3)") rPotentialMelt
01486             write(*,FMT="('----------------------------------------------------')")
01487           end if
01488 #endif
01489 
01490           if(cel%rSnowCover > rPotentialMelt) then
01491             cel%rSnowMelt = rPotentialMelt
01492             cel%rSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover - rPotentialMelt
01493           else
01494             cel%rSnowMelt = cel%rSnowCover
01495             cel%rSnowCover = rZERO
01496           end if
01497         end if
01498       end if
01499 
01500       rChgInSnowCover = cel%rSnowCover - rPreviousSnowCover
01501 
01502       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01503         REAL(rChgInSnowCover,kind=T_DBL), iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV,iMonth,iZERO)
01504       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01505         REAL(cel%rNetPrecip,kind=T_DBL),iNET_PRECIP,iMonth,iZERO)
01506       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01507         REAL(cel%rSnowMelt,kind=T_DBL),iSNOWMELT,iMonth,iZERO)
01508       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01509         REAL(cel%rSnowWaterEquiv,kind=T_DBL),iSNOWFALL,iMonth,iZERO)
01510       call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell( &
01511         REAL(cel%rSnowCover,kind=T_DBL),iSNOWCOVER,iMonth,iZERO)
01512 
01513 
01514     end do
01515 
01516     !$OMP END DO
01517 
01518   end do
01519 
01520   ! a call to the UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell subroutine with a value of "iNumGridCalls"
01521   ! as the final argument triggers the routine to update monthly and annual stats
01522   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iCHG_IN_SNOW_COV,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01523   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iINTERCEPTION,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01524   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iNET_PRECIP,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01525   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iSNOWMELT,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01526   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iSNOWFALL,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01527   call stats_UpdateAllAccumulatorsByCell(rD_ZERO,iSNOWCOVER,iMonth,iNumGridCells)
01528 
01529   return
01530 
01531 end subroutine model_ProcessRainPRMS
01532 
01533 !!***
01534 
01535 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01536 !!****s* model/model_ProcessRunoff
01537 ! NAME
01538 !   model_ProcessRunoff - Calls method-specific subroutines to handle
01539 !                         surface runoff calculation.
01540 !
01541 ! SYNOPSIS
01542 !   This subroutine calls the appropriate subroutine for calculating
01543 !   surface runoff based on whether the user has selected the iterative
01544 !   or downhill solution.
01545 !
01546 ! INPUTS
01547 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
01548 !   pConfig - Pointer to the model configuration data structure.
01549 !   iDayOfYear - Day of the current year (January 1 = 1).
01550 !   iMonth - Month corresponding to the current model day (January = 1).
01551 !
01552 ! OUTPUTS
01553 !   NONE
01554 !
01555 ! NOTES
01556 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
01557 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
01558 !       of pointers.
01559 !
01560 ! SOURCE
01561 
01562 subroutine model_ProcessRunoff(pGrd, pConfig, iDayOfYear, iMonth)
01563 
01564   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
01565   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd          ! pointer to model grid
01566   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01567                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01568   integer (kind=T_INT),intent(in) :: iDayOfYear    ! day of current year (January 1 = 1)
01569   ! [ LOCALS ]
01570   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCount
01571   integer (kind=T_INT) :: j, i
01572   real (kind=T_DBL) :: xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax
01573   integer (kind=T_INT), intent(in) :: iMonth     ! Integer month value (1-12)
01574   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumGridCells
01575 
01576   ! calculate number of cells in model grid
01577   iNumGridCells = pGrd%iNX * pGrd%iNY
01578 
01579   ! Iteratively processes the runoff event; first initialize the upstream flows
01580   pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rInFlow = rZERO
01581   pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rOutFlow = rZERO
01582   pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rFlowOutOfGrid = rZERO
01583 
01584   if ( pConfig%iConfigureRunoffMode == CONFIG_RUNOFF_ITERATIVE ) then
01585     do
01586       iCount = if_model_RunoffIteration( pGrd, pConfig, iDayOfYear, iMonth )
01587       if ( iCount == 0 ) then
01588         exit
01589       endif
01590     end do
01591 
01592   else if (pConfig%iConfigureRunoffMode == CONFIG_RUNOFF_DOWNHILL ) then
01593     call model_RunoffDownhill( pGrd, pConfig, iDayOfYear, iMonth )
01594 
01595   else if (pConfig%iConfigureRunoffMode == CONFIG_RUNOFF_NO_ROUTING ) then
01596     call model_Runoff_NoRouting( pGrd, pConfig, iDayOfYear, iMonth )
01597 
01598   else
01599     call Assert(lFALSE,"Internal error selecting a runoff routing module" &
01600       //" runoff mode = "//TRIM(int2char(pConfig%iConfigureRunoffMode)), &
01601       TRIM(__FILE__),__LINE__)
01602   end if
01603 
01604   ! Update the moving average counter
01605   iDayCtr = iDayCtr + 1
01606   if ( iDayCtr > iMOVING_AVG_TERMS ) iDayCtr = 1
01607 
01608   ! Update the inflow buffer (used to determine antecedent runoff conditions)
01609   pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rNetInflowBuf(iDayCtr) = pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rNetPrecip &
01610            + pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rSnowMelt + pGrd%Cells(:,:)%rInflow
01611 
01612   return
01613 end subroutine model_ProcessRunoff
01614 
01615 !!***
01616 
01617 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01618 !!****s* model/model_ConfigureRunoffDownhill
01619 ! NAME
01620 !   model_ConfigureRunoffDownhill - Establishes sorted list of grid cells
01621 !                                   (upstream-to-downstream) for use in the
01622 !                                   downhill solution method.
01623 !
01624 ! SYNOPSIS
01625 !   This subroutine is only called if the user selects the downhill surface
01626 !   runoff solution method. This routine systematically combs the model domain
01627 !   looking for cells which either receive no runoff, or receive runoff from
01628 !   cells that are already in the downhill runoff routing table.
01629 !
01630 !   The routing table is saved in a file named 'swb_routing.bin', which
01631 !   is an unformatted Fortran data file.  Once this table exists, the
01632 !   code will take routing information from this table first before
01633 !   running through the process of determining a routing table from scratch.
01634 !
01635 ! INPUTS
01636 !   pGrd - Pointer to the model grid data structure.
01637 !   pConfig - Pointer to the model configuration data structure.
01638 !
01639 ! OUTPUTS
01640 !   NONE
01641 !
01642 ! NOTES
01643 !   ** Code refers to parameters that are set within types.f95.
01644 !   ** Code directly modifies model grid values through the manipulation
01645 !       of pointers.
01646 !
01647 ! SOURCE
01648 
01649 subroutine model_ConfigureRunoffDownhill( pGrd, pConfig)
01650 
01651   ! [ ARGUMENTS ]
01652   type ( T_GENERAL_GRID ),pointer :: pGrd          ! pointer to model grid
01653   type (T_MODEL_CONFIGURATION), pointer :: pConfig ! pointer to data structure that contains
01654                                                    ! model options, flags, and other settings
01655   ! [ LOCALS ]
01656   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iCol, iRow, iStat, tj, ti, iTgt_Row, iTgt_Col,k,iCumlCount,iCount
01657   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iRowSub, iColSub, iNChange, iUpstreamCount, iPasses
01658   integer (kind=T_INT) :: ic
01659   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumGridCells
01660   integer (kind=T_INT) :: iNumIterationsNochange
01661   logical (kind=T_LOGICAL) :: lExist
01662   logical (kind=T_LOGICAL) :: lCircular = lFALSE
01663   type( T_GENERAL_GRID ), pointer :: pTempGrid
01664   type (T_CELL),pointer :: cel
01665 
01666   ! calculate number of gridcells in model domain
01667   iNumGridCells = pGrd%iNY * pGrd%iNX
01668 
01669   ! set iteration counter
01670   iNumIterationsNochange = 0
01671 
01672   pTempGrid=>grid_Create( pGrd%iNX, pGrd%iNY, pGrd%rX0, pGrd%rY0, &
01673              pGrd%rX1, pGrd%rY1, T_INT_GRID )
01674 
01675   allocate(iOrderCol(pGrd%iNY*pGrd%iNX), iOrderRow(pGrd%iNY*pGrd%iNX), stat=iStat)
01676   call Assert( iStat == 0, &
01677      "Could not allocate order of solution vectors for downhill procedure")
01678 
01679   INQUIRE( FILE='swb_routing.bin', EXIST=lExist)
01680   EXISTS: if (.not. lExist) then
01681 
01682     iPasses = 0
01683     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "Configuring the downhill routing table..."
01684     flush(UNIT=LU_LOG)
01685     iOrderCount = 0
01686     pGrd%Cells%lDownhillMarked = lFALSE
01687 
01688     do
01689       iNChange = 0
01690       do iCol=1,pGrd%iNX  ! last index in a Fortan array should be the slowest changing
01691         do iRow=1,pGrd%iNY
01692 
01693           cel => pGrd%Cells(iRow,iCol)
01694           if ( cel%lDownhillMarked ) cycle
01695           ! Count upstream cells
01696           iUpstreamCount = 0
01697 
01698           ! now search all adjacent cells which have current cell
01699           ! as their target
01700 
01701           lCircular = lFALSE
01702 
01703           do iRowSub=iRow-1,iRow+1
01704             if (iRowSub>=1 .and. iRowSub<=pGrd%iNY) then     ! we're within array bounds
01705               do iColSub=iCol-1,iCol+1
01706                 if (iColSub>=1 .and. iColSub<=pGrd%iNX) then  ! we're within array bounds
01707                   if (iRow==iRowSub .and. iCol==iColSub) cycle  ! Skip current inquiry cell
01708                     if (pGrd%Cells(iRowSub,iColSub)%lDownhillMarked) cycle  ! Don't count marked neighbors
01709                     call model_DownstreamCell(pGrd,iRowSub,iColSub,tj,ti)
01710                       if (tj==iRow .and. ti==iCol ) then
01711                         iUpstreamCount = iUpstreamCount+1
01712                         ! we've found a cell that points to the current model
01713                         ! cell; does our current model cell point back at it?
01714                         ! if so, we have circular flow
01715                         call model_DownstreamCell(pGrd,iRow,iCol,iTgt_Row,iTgt_Col)
01716                         if (iTgt_Row==iRowSub .and. iTgt_Col==iColSub ) lCircular = lTRUE
01717                       end if
01718                 end if
01719               end do
01720             end if
01721           end do
01722 
01723           ! If there are none, we can mark this cell
01724           ! If we have circular flow (a points to b, b points to a),
01725           ! we can mark the current cell; both a and b will be set to
01726           ! closed depressions in subsequent processing
01727           if ( iUpstreamCount == 0  &
01728             .or. (iUpstreamCount == 1 .and. lCircular)) then
01729             iNChange = iNChange+1
01730             cel%lDownhillMarked = lTRUE
01731             iOrderCount = iOrderCount+1
01732             iOrderCol(iOrderCount) = iCol
01733             iOrderRow(iOrderCount) = iRow
01734             !write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'found ',iOrderCount, iRow, iCol
01735           elseif ( iNumIterationsNochange > 10 ) then
01736             ! convert offending cell into a depression
01737             ! we've gotten to this point because flow paths are circular;
01738             ! this is likely in a flat area of the DEM, and is in reality
01739             ! likely to be a depression
01740             iNChange = iNChange+1
01741             cel%lDownhillMarked = lTRUE
01742             cel%iFlowDir = 0
01743             iOrderCount = iOrderCount+1
01744             iOrderCol(iOrderCount) = iCol
01745             iOrderRow(iOrderCount) = iRow
01746             !write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'found ',iOrderCount, iRow, iCol
01747           end if
01748 
01749         end do  ! loop over rows
01750       end do  ! loop over columns
01751 
01752       if ( iNChange==0 ) then
01753 
01754         iNumIterationsNochange = iNumIterationsNochange + 1
01755 
01756         iCumlCount = 0
01757         write(LU_LOG,"(/,1x,'Summary of remaining unmarked cells')")
01758 
01759         ! loop over possible (legal) values of ther flow direction grid
01760         do k=0,128
01761           iCount=COUNT(.not. pGrd%Cells%lDownHillMarked &
01762             .and.pGrd%Cells%iFlowDir==k)
01763           if(iCount>0) then
01764             iCumlCount = iCumlCount + iCount
01765             write(LU_LOG,FMT="(3x,i8,' unmarked grid cells have flowdir value: ',i8)") &
01766               iCount, k
01767           end if
01768         end do
01769 
01770         write(LU_LOG,FMT="(3x,a)") repeat("-",60)
01771         write(LU_LOG,FMT="(3x,i8,' Total cells with nonzero flow " &
01772           //"direction values')") iCumlCount
01773 
01774         where( pGrd%Cells%lDownHillMarked )
01775           pTempGrid%iData = iROUTE_CELL_MARKED
01776         elsewhere
01777           pTempGrid%iData = pGrd%Cells%iFlowDir
01778         end where
01779 
01780 !#ifdef GRAPHICS_SUPPORT
01781 !        call genericgraph(pTempGrid)
01782 !#endif
01783 
01784 #ifdef DEBUG_PRINT
01785 
01786       call grid_WriteArcGrid("iteration"//TRIM(int2char(iPasses))// &
01787           "problem_gridcells.asc", &
01788           pTempGrid%rX0,pTempGrid%rX1,pTempGrid%rY0,pTempGrid%rY1, &
01789           REAL(pTempGrid%iData,kind=T_SGL))
01790 
01791 #endif
01792 
01793       else
01794         ! reset iteration counter
01795         iNumIterationsNochange = 0
01796       end if
01797 
01798       if(iOrderCount == iNumGridCells) exit
01799       iPasses = iPasses+1
01800       write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) 'Iteration ',iPasses,'  ',iOrderCount,&
01801          ' of ',iNumGridCells,' cells have been configured'
01802     end do
01803 
01804     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) "  Number of passes required: ",iPasses
01805     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) ""
01806     flush(UNIT=LU_LOG)
01807 
01808     open(UNIT=LU_ROUTING, FILE='swb_routing.bin',FORM='UNFORMATTED', &
01809       status='REPLACE',ACCESS='STREAM')
01810     write(LU_ROUTING) iOrderCount
01811 
01812     do ic=1,iOrderCount
01813       write(LU_ROUTING) iOrderCol(ic),iOrderRow(ic)
01814     end do
01815     flush(UNIT=LU_ROUTING)
01816     close(UNIT=LU_ROUTING)
01817 
01818   else ! routing table already exists
01819 
01820     pGrd%Cells%lDownhillMarked = lTRUE
01821     open(UNIT=LU_ROUTING, FILE='swb_routing.bin',FORM='UNFORMATTED', &
01822       ACCESS='STREAM')
01823     read(LU_ROUTING) iOrderCount
01824 
01825     ! crude error checking to see whether the routing table has the right
01826     ! number of elements
01827     call Assert(LOGICAL(iOrderCount==iNumGridCells,kind=T_LOGICAL), 
01828      'Problem with existing routing file.  Delete swb_routing.bin and rerun')
01829 
01830     do ic=1,iOrderCount
01831       read(LU_ROUTING) iOrderCol(ic),iOrderRow(ic)
01832     end do
01833 
01834     close(UNIT=LU_ROUTING)
01835 
01836     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) ""
01837     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "*****************************************************************************"
01838     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "NOTE: Read in downhill routing information from existing swb_routing.bin file"
01839     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*)  "*****************************************************************************"
01840     write(UNIT=LU_LOG,FMT=*) ""
01841     flush(UNIT=LU_LOG)
01842 
01843     write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT=*)  "*****************************************************************************"
01844     write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT=*)  "NOTE: Read in downhill routing information from existing swb_routing.bin file"
01845     write(UNIT=LU_STD_OUT,FMT=*)  "*****************************************************************************"
01846 
01847   end if EXISTS
01848 
01849   return
01850 
01851  end subroutine model_ConfigureRunoffDownhill
01852 
01853 !!***
01854 
01855 !--------------------------------------------------------------------------
01856 !!****s* model/model_RunoffDownhill
01857 ! NAME
01858 !   model_RunoffDownhill - Performs a "downhill" one-pass solution for
01859 !                          the surface water runoff calculation.
01860 !
01861 ! SYNOPSIS
01862 !   This subroutine makes a single pass through all grid cells in the
01863 !   model domain in order to calculate surface water runoff. The grid
01864 !   cells farthest upstream are solved first. Calculation of runoff amounts
01865 !   proceeds from upstream to downstream until a calculation has been made
01866 !   for all grid cells.
01867 !
